mapper.select: select QTSKU, REFSKU, NAME, STANDARD, SORT, UNIT, NETWEIGHT, GW, LENGTH, WIDTH, HEIGHT, CUSTOMNAMECN, CUSTOMNAMEEN, CUSTOMHSCODE, ORIGIN, CURRENCY, UNITPRICE, UPDATETIME, WAREHOUSEID, WAREHOUSENAME, SKUSTOCK, AVAILABLESTOCK, ERRFLAG, ERRDESC, USERID from db_qtsku where QTSKU = #{qtsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select QTSKU, REFSKU, NAME, STANDARD, SORT, UNIT, NETWEIGHT, GW, LENGTH, WIDTH, HEIGHT, CUSTOMNAMECN, CUSTOMNAMEEN, CUSTOMHSCODE, ORIGIN, CURRENCY, UNITPRICE, UPDATETIME, WAREHOUSEID, WAREHOUSENAME, SKUSTOCK, AVAILABLESTOCK, ERRFLAG, ERRDESC, USERID from db_qtsku
mapper.sql: QTSKU , REFSKU , NAME , STANDARD , SORT , UNIT , NETWEIGHT , GW , LENGTH , WIDTH , HEIGHT , CUSTOMNAMECN , CUSTOMNAMEEN , CUSTOMHSCODE , ORIGIN , CURRENCY , UNITPRICE , UPDATETIME , WAREHOUSEID , WAREHOUSENAME , SKUSTOCK , AVAILABLESTOCK , ERRFLAG , ERRDESC , USERID

QTSKU = #{qtsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
REFSKU = #{refsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STANDARD = #{standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
NETWEIGHT = #{netweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
GW = #{gw,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
LENGTH = #{length,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
WIDTH = #{width,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
HEIGHT = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CUSTOMNAMECN = #{customnamecn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CUSTOMNAMEEN = #{customnameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CUSTOMHSCODE = #{customhscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ORIGIN = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CURRENCY = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
UNITPRICE = #{unitprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
WAREHOUSEID = #{warehouseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
WAREHOUSENAME = #{warehousename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SKUSTOCK = #{skustock,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
AVAILABLESTOCK = #{availablestock,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ERRFLAG = #{errflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ERRDESC = #{errdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and 1=1
